name: (draft) select function name
description: the expression try to match function name and try to skip some illegal ones (yeah, it's not totally completed and whether the syntax available is platform/language dependent). So it could be used as an assist tool but need to check twice.
content:
LEFT JOIN ^\w func1(func2()) func3(func4(a) func5(b)) func6 ( func7 ( a )  func8 ( b ) )
          BDSECM B sub(123) a \

          BDSECM B sub(123) a \
			      substr(12 test(1 2) 3) b
             ON     SUBSTR (A.TXNT_DATE, 1, 6) = SUBSTR (B.TXNT_DATE, 1, 6)
				 func9(a,b, c)
notfunc1( a b c )
notfunc2( select * from A )
				 

numb\'ro: 'awesome\', potato', ibbi:jepsi.kondi, 121, [ta\'l: 3, pepsi, [test, pest], 'cola'], {'test': 1234}, "jaw"
create or replace
